body:
- Fixed crash related to using color codes in chat
- Fixed cryllic characters not being displayed in chat
- Fixed a few crashes
- Fixed friendly units dropping random items on death
- Fixed ore blocks not using localized item names
- Fixed controls not displaying their localized names [Desktop]
- Improved Discord rich presence text [Desktop]
- Various translation bundles updated
name: 4.0 Build 52 - Unstable Alpha
